entry.title: Talk Python interview with Paulus Schoutsen
entry.content: Join Michael Kennedy at the Talk Python podcast for an hour long interview with Paulus Schoutsen, the founder of Home Assistant, as they discuss the release of Hass.io and the vision for the perfect home automation. Visit the episode page on Talk Python

entry.title: Home Assistant Podcast #3
entry.content:
The third episode of the Home Assistant Podcast is out. Paulus joins to talk about some stats and the release of 0.47 and Petar tells all about his Floorplan project for Home Assistant.
